name: Moevenpick Hotel Zurich-Airport

reviews.text: Stayed here during the first night of my Switzerland visit in August 2006; was surprised to receive a complementary welcome drink when arriving (choice between juice or sparkling wine). The rooms are very spacious and clean, and the soundproof windows and A/C make your stay a quiet one, even though it is near the airport and right beside the autobahn. It is easily accessible from the airport (it has its own shuttle bus), and from there you reach the centre of Zürich in 12 minutes. The staff is very friendly and helpful, and the restaurants are good (be aware that to get to the Chinese Dim Sum restaurant you have to go through the regular restaurant to get to it).
reviews.title: Great choice for entering/leaving Switzerland
Had an excellent stay.
reviews.text: Breakfast is wonderful, with a huge assortment to choose from (more than 80 articles).
Was planning on staying in Liechtenstein for a night on the roundtrip, but decided to head straight back to Zürich to stay here one more night :)
reviews.title: One Night!

likes.liked: — How close it was to the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Moevenpick Hotel Zurich-Airport a couple of days ago and truly enjoyed the product and service provided. We did stay in one of the recently renovated rooms on the 10th floor, which was a great experience. Congratulations to the nice design and the set up!
reviews.title: Not bad at all - great for what it is

likes.liked: — although an airport hotel, did not feel isolated - lots of other tourists hanging around
likes.disliked: — nothing else to do but eat and sleep since

reviews.text: All the staff from when we checked in, while we had dinner at the Moevenpick Restaurant, until we left was very friendly and of great help. Being a tourist in Switzerland for two weeks I was given great advice of where to go and what to see.
reviews.title: Great convience and comfortable stay

likes.liked: — Rooms were nice and large and airport shuttle was great
likes.disliked: — Not close to anything else, and if you eat in, it's pricey

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at three different hotels around Zurich during our week. The Movenpick is the bargain in Switzerland, great large rooms, clean, nice staff, free wine at registration. You save so much with their free shuttles every 15 minutes. This is for the family or travellers who want to save money and stay in a 4 star hotel. The Chinese Resturant serves greta meals. If your on a honeymoon, stay at the Dolder for three times as much money. Dont stay tat the Sofitel, terrible staff.
reviews.title: Best hotel for price, free shuttles, great food and rooms
No hot water - AGAIN
reviews.text: Well the renovation has been completed and the noise is gone but the lack of hot water is still an issue. One would think that this being a 4star hotel with rates like 329CHF ($289 US) per night that hot water wouldnt be an issue.

House keeping has to visit the room at least 3 times per day for security reasons, so they say. Even when the DND is out on the door they will call the room and knock on the door just to see if the room is okay. Being someone who lives in hotels 20 days out of the month .... this is the only place that performs this "security" function. And 33CHF ($27US) for the breakfast buffet .. well you can figure that one out. Expect a 60CHF ($53US) bill if you eat in the resturant - although the food is great its still very small portions. But thats found most everywhere in the city as well.
reviews.title: We loved this hotel

reviews.text: The best thing about this property is the location to the train system and the front desk people are all very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: I hated this hotel

likes.disliked: — the bed, I was never so uncomfortable (and I usually have no trouble sleeping)

reviews.title: Very disappointing last night in Switzerland
reviews.text: Went on a business trip to Zurich and stayed at this hotel with a colleague. Both of us were delighted by the friendliness of the staff, the choice of 4 excellent restaurants and of course the cleanliness and modern style of our hotel rooms. Staying in hotels frequently we felt pampered throughout our stay and will be back soon. We definetely recommend the hotel to anyone travelling to Zurich.

I've stayed there twice and each time's been wonderful. The staff are friendly,helpful and very efficient. Lovely, well decorated rooms and very quiet so always a great nights sleep after a long flight. The shuttle is very convenient and regular so it's off the plane and into the hotel in a few minutes. I'll be staying there again.
reviews.title: Great hotel!
Pretty good
reviews.text: The shuttle service to and from the airport provided by the Moveinpick is excellent and VERY PROMPT. The lobby and outdoor bar are extremely nice. The restaurant is good, too. My son got a great burger. As with all Swiss run venues- the service was flawless.. We were given a glass of champagne (OJ for the kids) at the reception desk. My only complaint was that the sheets were incredibly scratchy! There were no pay movies, which cards in the room kept touting, but that is minor.

We filled out the comments card, which I alwys do, but this time it entered us in a contest to win a trip to Beruit- the location of their newest project. We received an e-mail that day saying they would look into the sheet problem!
reviews.title: Great Airport Convenience
Not a good choice!
reviews.text: I heard later, there was a hotel directly across from the airport, but I'd still consider this to be an excellent choice if you just want to sleep before you fly.

reviews.title: As expected: close to the airport, reasonable, comfortable
reviews.text: We stayed at the Movenpick on the last night of our European vacation, so all we really needed was a place to sleep that could offer convenience to the airport for our flight out the next morning. We ended up with more than we expected! We were greeted with champagne and friendly service at check-in. The young lady at the desk made dinner reservations for us at their hotel restaurant (actually, they have 3 restaurants on the premisis). The room itself was easily the largest room we had during our 3-country tour. The fitness center was very nice, as well (new and clean cardio equipment). The shuttle the next morning was prompt, and took us to the airport in a matter of minutes.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This a large busy hotel located right next to the airport. Room was large, quiet and comfortable and the TV even had 6 channels in English. Only place we stayed that when you turned water on in the bathroom basin it affected the temperature of the water in the shower. Parking is expensive. We thought the hotel resturants overpriced. I paid 12 swiss francs for a small plate at the salad bar.
reviews.title: Comfortable Airport Hotel

likes.liked: — Large quiet room with lots of TV channels in English

reviews.text: We stayed a Sat night here and on Sunday morning when we went down for breakfast at 8am there was a long line for the buffett and there were no clean tables available once you got your food. One waitress told us we couldn't sit at her clean tables as she just finished cleaning them, which didn't make sense at all to us and all the others she sent away.
reviews.title: What a great hotel

likes.liked: — Location near airport, nice clean room, good value

reviews.text: Lots of tour groups spend either their first or last nights here so be ready for that but otherwise a very nice airport hotel
reviews.title: The quiet was wonderful!
A Movenpick Moment
reviews.text: One night visit, to catch flight out of airport the next morning. Was kind of expecting a Holiday Inn type hotel, pleasantly surprised.

Convenient shuttle to/from airport. Staff very friendly, room very nice, good bathroom. Had room service for dinner, food was very good. Buffet breakfast was exceptional, lots of different foods and very good.
reviews.title: Nothing special

description: The first-class Mövenpick Hotel Zurich-Airport is the perfect hotel to stay at during your trip to Zurich, whether it’s for business or leisure. The accommodation has 333 modern bedrooms to choose from and a variety of fine restaurants. Our fully equipped conference rooms with top notch facilities make our hotel the ideal venue to hold your meetings and conferences for up to 400 participants. The hotel runs a free shuttle bus to and from the airport, which is only minutes away. Quick connections to both the airport and the city centre make the Mövenpick Hotel Zurich-Airport the perfect choice for exploring the city of Zurich and its surroundings.
